column1: 1 ^ Ecce qŭam bonum et qŭam jucùndum habitáre fratres in unum. ^ Behold how good and how pleasant it is for brethren to dwell together in unity.

column4: qŭod descèndit in órlam vestimènti ejus~; ^ Like the precious ointment on the head
column5: that runneth down upon the beard
column7: which runneth down to the edge of his garment~;

column2: qŭi descèndit in montem Siónis. Qŭóniam illic mandávit Dòminus benedictiónem
column3: et vitam usqŭe in sáĕculum. ^ as the dew of Hermon
column4: which descendeth upon mount Sion. For there the Lord hath commanded blessing
